last_episode_to_air.name: Horror-Scope Scoob
last_episode_to_air.overview: While visiting a TV studio, the gang finds themselves swindled out of the Chest of Demons.

name: The 13 Ghosts of Scooby-Doo
overview: Shaggy and Scooby-Doo and friends must return 13 ghosts which they inadvertently released to a magical chest. Together with Daphne and Scrappy-Doo, along with  newcomer Flim-Flam, they travel the world facing the ghosts that must be returned to the chest.

episodes.name: To All the Ghouls I've Loved Before
episodes.overview: The gang lands their plane in a town populated by werewolves; Bogel and Weerd trick Scooby and Shaggy into opening the chest of demons; pint-sized conman Flim-Flam joins the gang.

episodes.name: Scoobra Kadoobra
episodes.overview: The gang heads to the evil forest to capture Maldor the Magnificent, but their plan is botched and Daphne is put under a sleeping beauty spell.

episodes.name: Me and My Shadow Demon
episodes.overview: The Chest of Demons is stolen by a shadow monster, so the gang heads off to maze-like Befuddle Manor to retrieve it, but soon they have to contend with demon chest escapee Queen Morbidia.

episodes.name: Reflections in a Ghoulish Eye
episodes.overview: While visiting a Moroccan paranormal convention, the gang has to stop a mirror demon.

episodes.name: That's Monstertainment
episodes.overview: Horror host and demon chest escapee Zomba magically transports Scooby and the gang into the film "The Son of the Bride of the Ghost of Frankenstein."

episodes.name: Ship of Ghouls
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang plan a restful vacation, unaware that the cruise ship they've booked passage on is populated by ghosts.

episodes.name: A Spooky Little Ghoul Like You
episodes.overview: Vincent Van Ghoul falls under a love spell cast by nefarious demon Nicara.

episodes.name: When You Witch Upon a Star
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang have to stop three bumbling witches who are in cahoots with demon Marcella.

episodes.name: It's a Wonderful Scoob
episodes.overview: Scooby has a traumatic experience with demon Time Slime and is replaced by lazy Bernie Gumshire, but Vincent Van Ghoul shows what will happen to the gang if Scooby doesn't come out of retirement.

episodes.name: Scooby in Kwackyland
episodes.overview: Bogel and Weerd help demon Demondo imprison Scooby and the gang in the funny papers.

episodes.name: Coast-to-Ghost
episodes.overview: Vincent Van Ghoul is turned to stone; Scooby and the gang wind up in cahoots with Bogel and Weerd while fending off two overzealous security guards.

episodes.name: The Ghouliest Show on Earth
episodes.overview: While visiting Scooby's parents in Dooville, Flim-Flam becomes hypnotized by a circus ringmaster.

episodes.name: Horror-Scope Scoob
episodes.overview: While visiting a TV studio, the gang finds themselves swindled out of the Chest of Demons.
